title: How does Lich Bane's extra damage work?
body:
Hey guys, I feel like a nub for asking this but:

Lich Bane buffs your next AA to deal “75% AD + 50% AP” damage.

Is this the total damage or the bonus damage (in that case the total of the autoattack is 100% AD + 75% AD + 50% AP)?

I’m wondering this since I was seeing how well Nid’s Takedown synergized with Lich Bane

replies.body: Yes. It does the normal damage plus the lichbane damage. 75% of base AD though, so the blue number not the green (when you hover over your AD)

You could read the description of the item and you'll have your answer. Hey, since I'm a nice guy I'll even quote the items description for you: "basic attack deals 75% Base Attack Damage (+50% of Ability Power) bonus magic damage on hit"
